problems.title: Find Maximum Element using Divide and Conquer
problems.description:
Problem Statement

You are given an array of N integers.
Find the maximum element using Divide and Conquer approach.
Divide array into two halves, find max in each half recursively, return the larger one.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5
3 7 2 9 5

Sample Output
9

Explanation:
Maximum element in the array is 9.
